</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;3dc8b5a3.1503">   <title>HTAI 2015 pre-conference workshops </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;3dc8b5a3.1503</link>   <description> Reminder: Early-bird registration ends on April 1.<br><br>*PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY FOR THOSE INTERESTED IN INFORMATION<br>RETRIEVAL FOR SYSTEMATIC REVIEWS, HTA AND OTHER EVIDENCE SYNTHESES!*<br><br>*Join us for two international full day pre-conference workshops*<br><br>*o**rganized by **the HTAi Interest Sub-Group on Information Resources<br>(IRG)* &lt;http://www.htai.org/index.php?id=554&gt;<br><br>*Saturday June 13th - INTRODUCTION TO INFORMATION RETRIEVAL FOR HEALTH<br>TECHNOLOGY ASSESSMENT*<br><br>*AND*<br><br>*Sunday June 14th - ADVANCED INFORMATION RETRIEVAL FOR HTA:* [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-11T21:30:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julie Glanville</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;3dc8b5a3.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;b1f3dbab.1503">   <title>HLG Newsletter - March issue now online </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;b1f3dbab.1503</link>   <description> *with apologies for cross posting*<br><br>The latest issue of the CILIP Health Libraries Group newsletter is now available online at:<br><br>http://www.cilip.org.uk/get-involved/special-interest-groups/health/pages/newsletter.aspx<br><br>Key items in this issue include:<br><br>Articles:<br><br>- Ipads on ward (Paediatric Diabetes) by Amanda Minns<br><br>Internet sites of interest:<br><br>- Head injury<br><br>Book Reviews:<br><br>- Kay, S. and Ennis, K. How to spot a dinosaur: or how to survive and thrive in the workplace. Professionalism Books, 2014. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-09T08:38:00+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Elise Hasler (NCC-C)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;b1f3dbab.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;7fabc07b.1503">   <title>Fwd: Vacancies at Colchester Hospital Library & Information Service </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;7fabc07b.1503</link>   <description> Apologies for cross posting.<br>There's a very tight deadline for applying, closing date is Monday 9th<br>March.<br>Best wishes,<br>Imrana.<br><br>*Imrana Ghumra*<br>*Professional Advisor, Library &amp; Knowledge Services*<br><br>*Health Education East of England*2-4 Victoria House *|* Capital Park *| *<br>Fulbourn *|* Cambridge *|* CB21 5XB<br><br>*T.* 01223 597534 *M*. 07826 873540<br>---------- Forwarded message ----------<br>From: *Richardson Andy (RDE) Colchester Hospital Uni NHS Foundation Tr* &lt;<br>Andy.Richardson@colchesterhospital.nhs.uk&gt;<br>Date: Tuesday, 3 March 2015<br>Subject: [Hlnlksmanagers] FW: Colchester Hospital Library &amp; Information<br>Service - Jobs<br>To: &quot;hln@libraryservices.nhs.uk&quot; &lt;hln@libraryservices.nhs.uk&gt; [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T07:26:47+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Imrana Ghumra</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;7fabc07b.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;e1abc84d.1503">   <title>Resources addressing issues around organ donation for religious and community organisations </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;e1abc84d.1503</link>   <description> Hi all<br><br>I am currently looking for resources which will help religious and<br>community organisations to discuss issues around organ donation with their<br>members. For example, Green Lane Mosque (30min into this video<br>https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hhutQm5FTuY) have included sections in<br>several of their sermons on organ donation (in particular, challenging the<br>view that it is in conflict with Muslim teaching) and this resource (<br>http://www.donorrecovery.org/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/Organ-Donation-Sermon-ideas.doc)<br>looks at passages from various religious texts which could be used as the<br>foundation for teaching and discussion. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T15:12:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kat Clayton</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;e1abc84d.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;38f41533.1503">   <title>Vacancy: Assistant Librarian (Knowledge Management) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;38f41533.1503</link>   <description> Come and join us by the beach and help in the next phase of the development of KnowledgeShare. We're recruiting an<br>Assistant Librarian (Knowledge Management). Closing date 15 March. More information on NHS Jobs at http://bit.ly/ALKMBrighton<br>To discuss the post, please contact Elaine Watson, Knowledge Management Librarian, 01273 523307 or email elaine.watson@bsuh.nhs.uk<br>Tom [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-04T10:43:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Roper, Tom</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;38f41533.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;ec10af5c.1503">   <title>STILL TIME TO APPLY! 5 Bursaries for HLG members to attend EAHIL Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;ec10af5c.1503</link>   <description> Dear All,<br>A reminder that there are 5 bursaries up for grabs for HLG members to attend the EAHIL Conference in Edinburgh - the deadline for applications is Friday 6th March.<br>Kind Regards,<br>Helene<br>From: Gorring Helene<br>Sent: 05 February 2015 16:35<br>To: 'HLG-MEMBERS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK'<br>Subject: 5 Bursaries for HLG members to attend EAHIL Conference 10 - 12 June 2015, Edinburgh [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-02T17:19:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Gorring Helene</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;ec10af5c.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;8f1f3eda.1502">   <title>Job vacancy: Information Specialist (York) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;8f1f3eda.1502</link>   <description> *Apologies for cross-posting*<br><br>Please pass this on to anyone who may be interested. For further<br>information, please contact Kate Misso - details below.<br><br>Job vacancy: Information Specialist<br><br>Full or part time, based in Escrick, York<br><br>Kleijnen Systematic Reviews (KSR) Ltd is an independent research company<br>that produces and disseminates systematic reviews and health technology<br>assessments of research evidence in health care. KSR was established in 2005<br>and is based in modern offices south of Escrick, York. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-26T18:03:04-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Misso</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;8f1f3eda.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;c46d8f3d.1502">   <title>A survey on library staff co-authorship and acknowledgement </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;c46d8f3d.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>We are writing to request your participation in a survey on library staff co-authorship and acknowledgement in publications. We are pursuing an understanding of the practice and attitude of librarians in regards to co-authorship and acknowledgement in publications for which they completed work.<br><br>The link to the survey: https://redcap1.mayo.edu/surveys/index.php?hash=1068c6e4c8051cfd4e9ea8072e3189e2<br><br>This is a research project and completion of this survey is completely voluntary. The research project and survey were reviewed by IRB and deemed exempt. We appreciate your time and effort in completing the survey, which will most likely take you 5 to 15 minutes to complete. Results will [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-23T23:11:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Catherine Voutier</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;c46d8f3d.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;50b5d39a.1502">   <title>REMINDER: ICLC 2015 at EAHIL </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;50b5d39a.1502</link>   <description> Dear Clinical &amp; Outreach Librarian colleagues,<br><br>We are collaborating with the European Association for Health Information and Libraries (EAHIL) and the International Conference of Animal Health Information Specialists (ICAHIS) to host a Workshop from 10-12 June 2015 in Edinburgh, UK. The joint EAHIL+ICAHIS+ICLC Workshop format will mostly be participative workshop sessions - for more information, please see https://eahil2015.wordpress.com [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-23T12:40:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Divall Pip - Clinical Librarian Service Manager</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;50b5d39a.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;f644673f.1502">   <title>Seven bursaries to attend the CILIP Conference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;f644673f.1502</link>   <description> CILIP Conference Bursaries<br><br>The Health Libraries Group (HLG) is pleased to offer seven bursary places to HLG members/students to attend this year's CILIP Conference in St George's Hall, Liverpool - Thursday, 2 July 2015 - to Friday, 3 July 2015<br>This will include:<br><br>* A complimentary place on both days of the conference<br>* Attendance at the drinks reception at the Museum of Liverpool on Thursday 2 July<br>* up to \ufffd\ufffd200 towards travel and accommodation. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-19T10:21:35+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Scarce, Margaret</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;f644673f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;9d571724.1502">   <title>Free CILIP Mentor Training - February and April 2015 - Birmingham, Leicester, Inverness </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;9d571724.1502</link>   <description> The following events are free to CILIP members.<br><br>Mentor training for CILIP professional registration<br><br>Birmingham 27 February 2015 book at https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/BirminghamMentorTraining2015<br><br>Leicester 23 April 2015 book at https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/LeicesterMentorTraining2015<br><br>Inverness 27 April 2015 book at https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/InvernessMT27April2015<br><br>Mentor Exchange of Experience<br><br>Cambridge 15 April 2015 (2.00 to 5.00pm) book at http://bit.ly/1u7ttKD&lt;http://info.cilip.org.uk/In/75614178/0/Ml7REk9PGb5gCewc9ohldO~YbvSydjL2GVRsmNE3ff9/&gt;<br><br>Edinburgh 28 April 2015 book at https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/EdinburghMEE28April2015<br><br>More dates are planned for the year.<br>Check your CILIP Member Network events calendar for future events or contact your Mentor Support Officer http://www.cilip.org.uk/cilip/jobs-careers/professional-registration/mentoring/mentor-support [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-17T11:18:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ferguson Linda (BRIDGEWATER COMMUNITY HEALTHCARE NHS FOUNDATION TRUST)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;9d571724.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;9e2e988f.1502">   <title>Clinical Librarian report on NHS of the Academy of Fabulous NHS Stuff </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;9e2e988f.1502</link>   <description> HI All<br>Roy Lilley (of NHS Managers e newsletter fame) has been instrumental in starting up a website of &quot;fabulous&quot; NHS practice - and there is a case report of clinical librarian practice - read here http://www.fabnhsstuff.net/2015/02/13/integration-of-a-clinical-librarian-into-mental-health-services/<br><br>I have a feeling that this site will grow so a great place to add our success stories - quickly and easily. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-17T09:12:38+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Gray Anne (NHS GREATER EAST MIDLANDS COMMISSIONING SUPPORT UNIT)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;9e2e988f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;955088a.1502">   <title>Getting Mood Boosting Books onto the Wards </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;955088a.1502</link>   <description> Hello,<br><br>I'm currently designing a pilot to launch Mood Boosting Books across the Trust to inpatients within a Mental Health Hospital.<br><br>I would be very grateful to hear from anyone who has done something similar.<br><br>I'm particularly interested in how you evaluated the service, but anything you could share on how you managed the process would be very welcome. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-16T13:05:31-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Hennessy Sarah</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;955088a.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;efbf8edc.1502">   <title>Conference Papers </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;efbf8edc.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>Can anybody pls assist with any of the following conference papers:<br><br>1. Hogg R, Yip B, Chan K, et al. Non-adherence to triple combination therapy is predictive of AIDS progression and death in HIV-positive men and women. 13th International AIDS Conference. Durban, South Africa. 2000. (Abstract TuOrB419).<br><br>2. Staszewski S, Gallant JE, Pozniak AL, et al. Efficacy and safety of tenofovir DF (TDF) versus stavudine (D4t) when used in combination with lamivudine and efavirenz in antiretroviral na\ufffd\ufffdve patients: 96-week preliminary interim results. 10th Conference on Retroviruses and Opportunistic Infections. Feb 1014, 2003, Boston, MA, Abs. 564b [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-10T23:35:26+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helen Grimes</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;efbf8edc.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;6fc2a51.1502">   <title>Fwd: Can you hear me? Improving your skills for communicating effectively. </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;6fc2a51.1502</link>   <description> Sent from Samsung tablet.<br><br>-------- Original message --------<br>From: Carol Brooks &lt;carolbrooks2612@NTLWORLD.COM&gt;<br>Date:09/02/2015 9:12 PM (GMT+00:00)<br>To: LIS-PROFESSION@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>Subject: Can you hear me? Improving your skills for communicating effectively.<br><br>Can you hear me? Information work evolves quickly. At Brighton and Sussex NHS Library and Knowledge Services we are ahead of the game, with a team of dynamic and enthusiastic colleagues, exploring different ways of working and expanding. We are not the finished article, but we are leading the way. Come and join us and help mould our future.<br>We are recruiting to two posts, a second Clinical Librarian to help strengthen and broaden our mature service to selected clinical teams in the acute trust, and a Primary Care Specialist Librarian, a new post to meet increasing demand [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-06T12:41:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Roper, Tom</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;8a458b9f.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;99b79c46.1502">   <title>FW: Mentor Training - Leicester </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;99b79c46.1502</link>   <description> Free for CILIP members. How to spot a Dinosaur is an effective and practical guide to understanding and managing your business and personal relationships.<br>This book helps you identify the different personality types around you and offers ways to deal with the difficulties in working with [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-15T15:36:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Elise Hasler (NCC-C)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;17d5d5d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;7b897bc9.1501">   <title>New Year - time to book yourself on an exciting workshop to make your library service visible and essential to users! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=HLG-MEMBERS;7b897bc9.1501</link>   <description> Dear All<br><br>We still have some places left on our workshop, so book now to get a chance to share with colleagues who are facing the same challenges as you are: How to deliver excellent targeted services in resource challenged times, how to ensure that your customers know about the library and value its services.
